MR No. 1329 - Miscellaneous Diary Entries


              "Elmshaven," St. Helena, California, Aug. 31, 1902 

     The Christ-Life. This morning I am grateful to my Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, that I slept well during the night and that the peace of the Saviour abides in my heart. I awoke at three o'clock with peace of mind and with the assurance that my talk on the Sabbath was just what our people needed. Everyone should understand the Scriptures. "What saith the law?" Christ inquires. "How readest thou?"
